SELECT T1.YEARMONTH, (SELECT BRANCHNAME FROM ba_branchmst WHERE BRANCHCODE = T1.BRANCHCODE) AS BRANCHCODE, (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM ba_deptmst WHERE BRANCHCODE = T1.BRANCHCODE AND DEPTCODE = T1.DEPTCODE) AS DEPTCODE, (SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl WHERE USEYN = 'Y' AND CCODE = '003' AND DCODE = T1.GRADE) AS GRADE, (SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl WHERE USEYN = 'Y' AND CCODE = '004' AND DCODE = T1.DUTY) AS DUTY, T1.INSACODE, (SELECT KNAME FROM hr_insamst WHERE INSACODE = T1.INSACODE) AS KNAME, T1.PAYDATE, T1.BASICAMT, T1.ACTAMT, T1.PRIZEAMT, T1.DAILYAMT, T1.TOTALAMT, (SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl WHERE CCODE = '013' AND DCODE = T1.TAXGUBUN) AS TAXGUBUN, T1.TAXINCOME, T1.TAXLOCAL, T1.SUPPLYTAX, T1.DEDUCTAMT, (SELECT BANKID FROM hr_taxpayeritem, sy_bankmst B WHERE INSACODE = T1.INSACODE AND BANKID = B.BANKCODE AND BASICACCT = 'Y') AS BANKID, (SELECT BANKNAME FROM hr_taxpayeritem, sy_bankmst B WHERE INSACODE = T1.INSACODE AND BANKID = B.BANKCODE AND BASICACCT = 'Y') AS BANKNAME, T1.ACCTNO, T1.ACCTOWNER FROM sa_monthpaytb T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.YEARMONTH = #S_YEARMONTH#
AND T1.PAYDATE = #S_PAYDATE#
AND T1.BRANCHCODE = #S_BRANCHCODE#
AND T1.DEPTCODE = #S_DEPTCODE#

SELECT #S_YEARMONTH# AS YEARMONTH, #S_PAYDATE# AS PAYDATE, T1.BRANCHCODE, T1.DEPTCODE, T1.GRADE, T1.DUTY, (SELECT BRANCHNAME FROM ba_branchmst WHERE BRANCHCODE = T1.BRANCHCODE) AS BRANCHNAME, (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM ba_deptmst WHERE DEPTCODE = T1.DEPTCODE) AS DEPTNAME, (SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl WHERE USEYN = 'Y' AND CCODE = '003' AND DCODE = T1.GRADE) AS GRADENAME, (SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl WHERE USEYN = 'Y' AND CCODE = '004' AND DCODE = T1.DUTY) AS DUTYNAME, INSACODE, KNAME, (CASE (SELECT DEPTGUBUN FROM ba_deptmst WHERE DEPTCODE = T1.DEPTCODE) WHEN '001' THEN BASICPAY ELSE '0' END) AS BASICPAY, (SELECT BANKNAME FROM hr_taxpayeritem, sy_bankmst B WHERE INSACODE = T1.INSACODE AND BANKID = B.BANKCODE AND BASICACCT = 'Y') AS BANKNAME, (SELECT BANKID FROM hr_taxpayeritem, sy_bankmst B WHERE INSACODE = T1.INSACODE AND BANKID = B.BANKCODE AND BASICACCT = 'Y') AS BANKID, (SELECT ACCTNO FROM hr_taxpayeritem WHERE INSACODE = T1.INSACODE AND BASICACCT = 'Y') AS ACCTNO, (SELECT ACCTOWNER FROM hr_taxpayeritem WHERE INSACODE = T1.INSACODE AND BASICACCT = 'Y') AS ACCTOWNER FROM hr_insamst T1 WHERE 1=1 AND BRANCHCODE = #S_BRANCHCODE# AND DEPTCODE = #S_DEPTCODE#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sa_monthpaytb ( YEARMONTH, INSACODE, BRANCHCODE, DEPTCODE, GRADE, DUTY, PAYDATE, BASICAMT, ACTAMT, PRIZEAMT, DAILYAMT, TOTALAMT, TAXGUBUN, TAXINCOME, TAXLOCAL, SUPPLYTAX, DEDUCTAMT, BANKID, ACCTNO, ACCTOWNER, INSERTUSER, INSERTDATE ) VALUES( #YEARMONTH#, #INSACODE#, #BRANCHCODE#, #DEPTCODE#, #GRADE#, #DUTY#, #PAYDATE#, #BASICAMT#, #ACTAMT#, #PRIZEAMT#, #DAILYAMT#, #TOTALAMT#, #TAXGUBUN#, #TAXINCOME#, #TAXLOCAL#, #SUPPLYTAX#, #DEDUCTAMT#, #BANKID#, #ACCTNO#, #ACCTOWNER#, 'admin', SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE sa_monthpaytb SET BRANCHCODE = #BRANCHCODE#, DEPTCODE = #DEPTCODE#, GRADE = #GRADE#, DUTY = #DUTY#, PAYDATE = #PAYDATE#, BASICAMT = #BASICAMT#, ACTAMT = #ACTAMT#, PRIZEAMT = #PRIZEAMT#, DAILYAMT = #DAILYAMT#, TOTALAMT = #TOTALAMT#, TAXGUBUN = #TAXGUBUN#, TAXINCOME = #TAXINCOME#, TAXLOCAL = #TAXLOCAL#, SUPPLYTAX = #SUPPLYTAX#, DEDUCTAMT = #DEDUCTAMT#, BANKID = #BANKID#, ACCTNO = #ACCTNO#, ACCTOWNER = #ACCTOWNER#, UPDATEUSER = 'admin', UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE() WHERE YEARMONTH = #YEARMONTH# AND INSACODE = #INSACODE#
